mission.title: Discover Mission
mission.message1:
Quality can be better than quantity in this platform

Practicing English daily with certified tutors has always been the most effective way of improving English communication skills.

English Guru allows you to practice online with native speakers using your computer, mobile or tablet. Sign up, choose your tutor and start learning!

feedback.title: Testimonials

faqs.answer1: English Guru is a platform where you can practice and improve your English by speaking online with native speaking tutors from your computer, tablet or smartphone at any time you wish.
faqs.answer2: Tutors who have experience about giving english education educate students as online.
